docs.snippet: Players are increasingly toweling off in between points, which Roger Federer likened to “a security blanket” but which some have criticized as a time-wasting tactic....
docs.lead_paragraph: Players are increasingly toweling off in between points, which Roger Federer likened to “a security blanket” but which some have criticized as a time-wasting tactic.
docs.abstract: Tennis players are increasingly toweling off in between points, which some have criticized as a time-wasting tactic; issue is of particular concern in games that go on for much longer than is usual.

headline.main: Weary of Pro Tennis Delays? Cry Into the Towel
